bibl.title: Ben cao gang mu dictionary Vol1

sense.def: Pathological Condition of chuang 瘡 , sores, conditions developing from human contact with saliva spat by poisonous snakes onto plants during the seventh and eighth month. Ben cao shi yi 本草拾遺 Substance Entry fu she 蝮蛇：吐口中涎沫於草木上，著人身腫成瘡，卒難主療， 名曰蛇漠瘡 , “They spit the saliva foam from their mouth onto plants. When humans touch this they develop a swelling and eventually sores. This is most difficult to cure. It is called ‘ snake spread sores ’”.
